::Scorponok-Zarak::
   
  The Scorpion steps closer as Zarak walks to the front. He looks down on this Decepticon Malice. All of Scorponok's weapons were aimed at malice and primed.
   
  Zarak: I fear you are mistaken, unless yet another has claimed the name Megatron. The true Megatron was changed into Galvatron centuries ago. Galvatron was merged with the Predacon terrorist Megatron to form Hydras. So you see Hydras is the true leader of both Decepticons and Predacons.
   
  Zarak was almost making himself sick talking up Hydras like this. He knew that eventually they would all bow to the Generation 2 Decepticon Empire. Once that happened he could overthrow Starscream and Jhiaxus and rule himself.

Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@...> wrote:
              Malice:
   
  Malice scoffed and dropped from the air to land.  His weapons were not rated to take on such heavily armored foes.  Perhaps he should have taken the job in Atlantis.  
   
  "Hmpt.  If megatron were here he'd have blown the place up already.  But he's playing diplomat," Malice said as he transformed and hovered in place.
   
  "I only bow to Megatron, true leader of the Decepticons, and this fool Hydras, comes up very short.  If you were smart, you would return to him."
  

  ----- Original Message ----
From: Richard Allen <roborick007@...>
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, March 12, 2008 1:35:18 PM
Subject: Re: Black Fortress/Mesagge to Lord Perseus

      ::Scorponok- Zarak::
   
  Scorponok changes to scorpion mode with Zarak now standing on top. The tail swings around, aiming it's fusion cannon tip at Malice.
   
  Zarak: Enough of this!
   
  Scorponok releases the fusion blast from the tail at Malice.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ yahoo.com> wrote:
      Myrmidon continued to float in midair as the attacker fired more
warning shots, and Hydras' order came in. Myrmidon glanced at Trelos
noting that he had no intention of stopping. Myrmidon could only hope
that Hydras would see this and reign him in, he had other things to
worry about, like dealing with this intruder.

He shifted only slightly as the warning shots came from the intruder,
he ignored them as he began speaking once more. "NO! It is you who do
not understand the peril you are in." Myrmidon's voice is smooth, deep
and authoritative, the sound of a warrior, one who is loosing patience.
"You will collect no bounty here without the concent of Hydras MASTER
of this base!"

Myrmidon shifted slighty as he spoke, lining up on Malice yet keeping
the base behind him, "You will either stand before him or you fall
before us! The choice is yours!" Myrmidon smiled slightly as he was
ready for battle, and almost hoped that this intruder would refuse, his
clawed hands opened and closed, eager to begin!

OOC: Remember, Myrmidon is floating. Shots at his feet will just pass
beneath him . . . if I understand your meaning??

Preston
(Myrmidon)

--- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@ yahoo.com> wrote:

> Malice:
> 
> "Predacons are in no way my descentants! "
> 
> Malice switched his beam rifle for the larger and more powerful beam
> cannon and fired a shot at trelos. Myrmidon would recieve a shot at
> his feet and Malice flew transverse his flight path to put all three
> in front of him. 
> 
> "I'm a bounty hunter. And I'm here to collect my bounty. My fight
> isn't with you, but if you insist on standing in my way, I'll have to
> hurt you a little."
